Dialogue: Is that you? Monad. I sense you. I know it is you. Yet you seem. More like. Them?
Our work is almost complete. I have manifested into this world. Yet I am still. Incomplete.
The time has come. Look to the skies! Return to me! Return to your creator!
TRIGGER WARNING: This world is rife with depravity, degeneracy, and damnation. Implied child abuse, substance abuse, murder, mutilation, and ritual sacrifices. Enter at your own risk.
